original_title: Patricia Arquette says we won’t have to wait ‘that long’ for the next season of ‘Severance’ | CNN
article_summary: "Patricia Arquette hints at a potential quick return for 'Severance' Season 3, while remaining tight-lipped about plot details due to the show's quality-focused production team. She also acknowledges fan theories about the show's enigmatic world, finding them intriguing."</s>
